CustomField.description: Will generate a CIF as adding this to the workflow rule that sends out the CIF at closed won
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Emails the Opportunity Owner the CIF form when selected, the Stage = Closed Won, and the record is saved. Will reset to unchecked once saved. FYI, you need to select this field from the Q/C record if you have a signed contract done via Docusign.
CustomField.label: Generate CIF Form (NA Only)
